facts.text: KoopaBackDashWaveSlide Hoverwalkmoonland Extends the length of a wavedash back (For Certain Characters)
Invisibe Ceiling Glitch (ICG) Is a Glitch That Cancels All Vertical Momentum. The glitch occurs when an attacker hits a shield, and get hit before the recoil is over
All of Samus's aerials have the same ammount of end lag. This Means Dair is +1 on Shield
Falcons Alternative Costumes Have Very minor ECB Changes
If You Hit DK Out Of up-b, He Loses His Charged Punch
If You Are Losing, The Base Grab Hold Time Is Reduced
Link Can Act Out Of CliffCatch Faster Then Anyone Else. He has 3 frames of CliffCatch While Others Have 7
Roy Can Reverse Up-B Jigglypuff For a One-Hit KO On Certain Stages
V-Canceling is a Technique that can reduce Knockback Velocity if you Input L/R With in 3 Frames
Dreamland's Platform's have Varying Lenghts and Heights
Marths Nair Has No Diffrence When Tippered, in Knockback Or Damage
You Could Play As Master Hand By Performing The Name Entry Glitch
Captain Falcon Has Two Taunts, Depending On Which Way Hes Facing
Pichu Has Two Taunts, Depending On Which Way Hes Facing
